description: Miyu-9, an android found by Schwartz. She reacted to the blood of Sifr Fran, and defeated Lena Sayers with extraordinary power that exceeds the Otomes. M-9, stated by Miyu, has the battle power of Shinso Fumi, which explains why she is so powerful. MIYU also referred to M-9 as her `sister`, so she may also be a product of the Sears Foundation. She has the ability to upgrade after fights to become stronger, and using the opponent`s abilities.
name: M-9
